StringTable.Label: Hotspot_ColinizingDec
StringTable.String: Colonizing new worlds is essential to expand a Civilization's [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zone of Control[/HS] and gaining access to more resources. Planets can only be [HS=HS_ColonizeOrder]Colonized[/HS] if there is no claim to the planet. Once a Planet is Colonized, it is claimed by the Colonizing Civilization. [BR][BR]A Planet must have a [HS=HS_PlanetClass]Planet Class[/HS] 1 or greater to be Colonized. Planets with a Planet Class of 0 are considered a [HS=HS_DeadWorld]Dead World[/HS] and can not be colonized.
